title: Print, "Orangeriee placé en Allées d'Arbres (Orangerie in Tree Paths), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: D. Marot fec:
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower margin: Orangeriee placé en Allées d'Arbres.; lower right: avec Privilege: 4
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Orangeriee placé en Allées d'Arbres (Orangerie in Tree Paths), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-22.
